Vladimir Chistiukhin

Senior Quality Assurance Engineer


Hi there! I am Vladimir Chistiukhin, Your Fellow QA engineer.
Having experience in enhancing quality assurance processes across multiple projects,
I like to go through every detail, see the full picture, test the most complicated solutions, and find tricky issues.

In the last few years, my primary focus has been on:

  • creating comprehensive documentation that covers various scenarios.
  • engaging in the entire development process from planning to release.
  • all-round testing for backend; iOS, Android, and web applications.
  • adopting the best practices to improve testing strategies.

Take a look at the Projects I have been involved in, or at my Timeline.
Let’s stay in touch - connect with me on LinkedIn or send me an Email.

Senior QA Engineer at Social Discovery Group

Feb. 2024 — Present

- Ensured project quality for a user base exceeding 1.2 million monthly active users.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including both technical and business stakeholders..
- Contributed to quality assurance processes throughout the project lifecycle.
- Coordinated team efforts and activities during all phases of the development cycle.
- Made proposals for optimal solutions balancing business requirements and team capabilities.

Senior QA Engineer at 4XXI

Feb. 2020 — Feb. 2024

- Implemented quality assurance processes from scratch for multiple projects.
- Adopted best practices through testing different approaches to pick the best ones.
- Designed comprehensive documentation for testing purposes to cover the end users experience.
- Designed detailed product documentation, contributing to a clearer understanding of project goals.
- Proposed adjustments in the UI/UX experience to deliver the best possible user experience.
- Effectively coordinated project teams, enhancing team collaboration during the development cycle.
- Provided mentorship to fellow QA engineers, contributing to their professional growth.

Middle QA Engineer at 4XXI

Mar. 2016 — Jan. 2020

- Helped in creating clear guides and plans for testing our product.
- Took care of new features, reported problems, and made sure fixes worked.
- Built and updated helper tools for testing purposes using toolsets.
- Used the best methods to make sure our projects quality was top-notch.
- Handled testing of the projects in deeper parts like APIs, databases, and logs.
- Guided new team members and helped junior staff learn and grow.

Junior QA Engineer at FreshOffice

Jan. 2014 — Feb. 2016

- Carried out tests to make sure everything in our product worked as it should.
- Wrote test documentation and plans to check our product quality.
- Learned and used the best practices in quality assurance.
- Engaged in development process, provided feedback, and helping dev team do a better job.
- Took part in meetings and discussions about our product, contributing from qa perspective.
